fields_of_interest: Competition, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Energy and Climate Policies. Resource Efficiency Policies. Health and environmental policies.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: CEFIC as well as sector and national product based associations
goals__remit:
INEOS Enterprises is a portfolio of businesses manufacturing chemicals, with sales of these products to customers around the world. The current portfolio comprises a number of discrete business units: Ammonia & Nitric Acid, Biodiesel, Brine & Water, Chlorotoluenes, Compounds, Esters, Expandable Polystyrene, Melamines, Paraform, Salt, Solvents, Sulphur Chemicals.  
Our diverse business and product portfolio serves a wide range of industry sectors, including intermediates in the production of other important chemical products.
